chetna.header_text: We work as push-up for various nss teams and organise various camps.

content.event_text: Planning proper waste management system in IIT Patna campus. Waste management is intended to reduce adverse effects of waste on health, environment and aesthetics.
Our chetna team is planning to conduct a street play on the ocassion of republic day to create a feeling of pride for our nation.
Chetna team is planning to launch NSS IIT Patna official blog where people can share there ideas and experiences with us.
Chetna team is planning for another blood donation camp in month of january or february in more planned and structured way.

section_aims.sub_header: चेतना ही विकास की जड़ होती है

content.event_text: Kerala faced devastating floods in the month of August. So Chetna team with collaboration of Students's Gymkhana collected funds from hostels, faculty quarters, etc.Total amount collected was nearly 28,000 from the student body in cash. Moreover, online portals were also active. The total contribution from IIT P family was around 2 lakhs.

Blood donation is major concern to the society as donated blood is lifesaving for individuals who need it. There is shortage of active blood donors and to overcome this problem NSS IITP organise blood donation camp every year. This year it was organised on 8 September 2018 and we get nearly 80 units of blood! An online quiz and painting competition were organised by us to spread awareness about blood donation.

Ashraya, a charity event of celesta ,was organised in which student fraternity will be visiting a school where we would interact with students and organize fun activities, also providing them with basic provisions. To make this event success Chetna team collabrated with celesta team to collect donation in hostels, faculty quarters and staff quarters.This event was organised on 10 October 2018.

environment.header_text: We, ENVIRONMENT team of NSS aim to plan and develop a cleaner and greener future for our campus and the nearby areas.

section_aims.sub_header: Problems in society never stop coming, and neither will we stop solving them.

content.event_text: This group aims at keeping the campus green , save the endangered environment and to beautify our life by planting trees at appropriate places inside the Campus. We protect plants to maintain the biodiversity and to preserve the flora and fauna.

Swachh Bharat Abhiyan launched by our prime minister, invalues the constitution of latrines, promoting sanitation programmes in the rural area, cleaning streets, roads and changing the infrastructure of the country to lead the country ahead. We wish to contribute in this mission by implementing it inside our campus and nearby areas

We started with spreading awareness amongst the people in the nearby village Amhara about the various plantation schemes which the government is running for the benefit of them. We collected a lot of information about problems villagers are facing. Now we are going to explain these schemes to the villagers and help them with their scheme of interest. We aid them in contacting the government and regularly attend them to help them time to time.

Plantation Drive was organized by us on 18th November 2018. All the necessary arrangements were made by the students so as to make the plantation drive a success. We bought about 150 saplings of ARJUNA tree. The team had already located areas where the plants need to be planted and within 4 hours, about 110 trees were planted. Students dug the ground and planted trees by themselves along with the assistance of NSS volunteers. The NSS Environment cell looks forward to organizing the same in future.

Under the Swachhta Pakhwada Of Swachh Bharat Mission, Five cleanliness drives were conducted by the NSS Environment wing. We collected the wastes spread around the area and also promoted segregation of waste materials. Professor-InCharge of NSS also participated in these drives to motivate us towards keeping our surroundings clean. Cleanliness Drives were conducted inside the campus from 8th to 15th September 2018.

We are going to help people in the nearby villages with their agricultural problems and aim to develop an innovation team in our cell to come up with new ideas to improve the agriculture conditions of the villagers. Through the innovation team, we will not just be helping farmers nearby, but whole India. We have also planned to work towards creating a park inside the campus.

rural.header_text: A new day has started with the sun blossoming it's sunshine all over spreading the warmth of service to humanity. The team also works to increase health standards of women.The Rural development wing of NSS spreads the message of independent living and positive thinking a hope to see bright futures ahead!!

content.event_text: Our Team is in preparation of establishing self help group in villages and we are in regular contact with the concerned authorites
We aim to discover small scale techniques for employing the youth of the amhara village.
We also aim to inform Them regarding various government schemes for their development.
We aim To make them comfortable enough so that they can talk about such issues among them.

section_aims.sub_header: Problems in society never stop coming, and neither will we stop solving them.

content.event_text: In these freezy winter’s there are many people out having no proper clothes to wear where as the better ones are trying to get some thick blankets. Our team caring for the unseen world as promised earlier donates the collected woollen clothes to the needy ones.

The growing need for sustainable resources is a matter of concern for both environment and humans. Nothing could be much better than switching to a resource that replaces a nonsustainable one and also innovates the use of Waste Material. One such project that seems to be the need of the hour is "CLOTH BAG". The women of Amhara with their skills of stitching and sewing have made many cloth bags to replace the plastic ones. These bags can be used in many household chores and also they help the environment in regaining its beauty.

To replace the plastic bags and to start paper bag and cloth bag market the Rural Development cell aims to develop a start Up to involve women in strengthening their economic knowledge and develop their standards. It also comes under the latest action of Bihar Govt to Ban Polythene Throughout the Territory.

teaching.header_text: A true guiding light is what lightens up the path towards a better future of a child. The NSS teaching cell works on the same lines with a motive to teach the young students of Amhara and make them aware about the various career opportunities they have.

content.event_text: We give Navodaya Coaching to the students of the village.
Regular exams are conducted to check the proficiency of the students.
Parents teacher interaction are held to inform the parents about the progress of the students.

section_aims.sub_header: Problems in society never stop coming, and neither will we stop solving them.

content.event_text: The Teaching Cell volunteers conduct classes in Amhara high school , Amhara, for 4 days in a week. All the subjects included in JNVST are covered during the classes in a systematic manner.

Tests based on all the subjects taught in the class are conducted once in a week . These tests are checked by the team volunteers and accordingly marks are given to the students. This helps the students to keep up with topics covered in the class and also study them regularly.

The Teaching Cell is aiming to increase the range of the exams for which they are preparing the children. This will include covering more subjects and efforts for the all-round development of the children.

technical.header_text:
Technology is just a tool.

In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.

content.event_text: We teach them the basics of computer that are required in everyday life.
We teach them how to communicate in English.
Exams are conducted regulary to check how much the students have learn.
Practicals of computer are given to students, so that they can apply what they have learned.
Parents Teacher meetings are conducted regularly.

section_aims.sub_header: Far far away, behind the word mountains, we have taught a lot. Few among them are...

content.event_text: The Spoken English divison of NSS Technical Skill provides free Spoken English training to the village tem. Excelling them in the field of english grammar, pronounciation etc. They teach all the stuffs that would reduce the communciation gap among the students and the world.

The Computer divison of NSS Technical Skill provides free computer and technical education to the students of the village. We teach all those things that are required by an individual to fit himslef in this digital world. We have taught them to use all the basic softwares of computer. We have a future plan to teach them how to access the internet, ecommerce, e-banking, e-document chacking, land papers checking and many other useful things.

Both the divisons work together under one umbrella "Technical Skills" with a motive to make the syudents self suffiecient to communicate with each other flawlessly and efficiently. Make them well acquainted with the digital world. Such that they become self sufficient to live a standard and helathy life. They should be able to make use of computer and mobile which has become an essential part of human life now a days.

events.details: Women's day was celebrated in IIT PATNA . There were events like singing, dance and  speech which highlighted the rights of women and sacrifices made by them .

'He who plants A tree plants A Hope.'' - Lucy Larcom.Keeping this in mind , NSS IIT PATNA had  organized a plantation drive in Amhara village for the students of class  6th to 10th  in order to encourage them and all the other people of village.

On the occasion of Republic Day,NSS IIT Patna  organised a Debate competition with the motive to discuss some pros and cons of the topics provided and work in accordance to serve the nation as a responsible citizen.

It was a moment of pride as the students of IIT Patna took part in the initiative taken by Government of Bihar - Jal Jeevan Hariyali for the conservation of environment and abolition of dowry and alcohol addiction.

There are a number of ways to save water. And, they all start with you.Keeping this in mind NSS IIT Patna organized Placard Making competition on Jal Jeevan Hariyali Abhiyan initiated by the Bihar Government.
NSS IIT Patna organised a blood donation campaign on 12th of january in IIT Patna Hospital in Collaboration with All India Institute of Medical Sciences(AIIMS), Patna.

Maintaining the tradition of donating clothes and other useful materials to the needy,NSS IIT Patna organised a Winter cloth donation camp amidst these winters. The camp took place on 11 December 2019 from 2pm to 4 pm covering the slum areas beside orbit mall and Mushahari tola near Raghopur covering the needs of almost 130 families.

NSS IIT Patna organised a short program to detail the students about Ek Bharat Shresth Bharat program in order to incorporate Collaboration and patriotic feelings in them and to spread the message of Unity in diversity.

A Helicopter Air Show was performed by SARANG TEAM of Indian Air Force at Air Force Station Bihta on16th 1November 2019  at 12.00 Noon.NSS  IIT Patna organised a trip for Adhyayan Students to Bihta air force station for witnessing the Energy of our Air Force show firsthand.The trip was organised under the event 'Ashraya'.Students were very excited  after seeing the breathtaking views and Formations of Sarang Team.

NSS IIT PATNA organised an event, Ashray for the students of Amhara School located in Amhara village In collaboration with Celesta, the techno-management fest of IIT PATNA. Ashray is a charity event in which the students of NSS,IIT PATNA interacted with school students of Amhara village and organised various fun events and Winners from each event were awarded with prizes.

The goal for the Run for Unity is to spread the message of national unity and have it permeate to every part of the nation and the society.Keeping this in mind,NSS IIT Patna successfully organised Run for unity on the occasion of Birth anniversary of Sardar Patel.

A person must be taught the importance of cleanliness from the childhood by parents and teachers. One such responsibility was taken today on 23rd october by NSS IIT Patna in association with East Central Railway Danapur Division to spread awareness on the railway station of Bihta.

'The eye is the lamp of the body. So if your eye is healthy your body will be full of light.' Following the same, IIT Patna in collaboration with Sarvadrishti Hospital organized an eye check-up camp on 19 October 2019 at IIT Patna Hospital .

We the NSS team of IIT Patna would like to express gratitude towards the everyone throughout the globe who enthusiastically donated to the Chief Minister of Bihar relief fund. Your efforts would obviously count and help the needful who have been struck by such disaster.

Plastic are a major cause of serious problems such as water and air.Keeping in mind NSS IIT Patna launches an event of short film making competition on 2nd of october with a motive to ban the  use of plastics..

On the occasion of 150th birth anniversary of our beloved bapu, NSS IIT Patna conducted a series of competitions including 'short filmmaking', 'story writing' and 'a minute for bapu speech' to remember and inculcate in us the high ideals which Gandhiji stood up for.

Review meetings provide an opportunity for the team member to have time with their reviewer: To discuss their performance and development. To discuss and agree future targets and objectives so to access all these NSS IIT patna organised a small formal meeting on 1st October at BIT Patna

Cleanliness begins at home. Keeping this in mind, NSS IIT Patna successfully conducted cleanliness drive—'swachhta pakhwada' on 7th, 8th and 15th September with the vision to make the campus clean and pollution free. The event saw large participation and enthusiasm.

हम गर्व से कहा करते हैं 'हिंदी हमारी राजभाषा है, हम सबकी यह अभिलाषा है' आज हिंदी दिवस के अवसर पर एन.एस.एस., आई. आई. टी. पटना अपनी राजभाषा को परम स्थान पर रखता है। हर भारतीय के दिल में बसी इस भाषा को दुनिया के हर कोने तक ले जाने का जुनून हम पे सवार है। हमारी संस्कृति को दर्शाती हिंदी भाषा के दिवस पर एन.एस.एस., आई. आई. टी. पटना सबको शुभकामनाए देता है।

AN OPEN DAY program was organised by IITPATNA for the children of village Amhara who are taught under Adhyayan and Prayatna. Also, the Annual Magazine of 2018-2019 was launched in this great occassion.
Let's speak in louder voice, Blood-donation make our choice. Let's follow our heart and give life to someone's heart and smile to many.!

Know AIDS for NO AIDS. NSS IIT Patna has successfully conducted awareness talk on AIDS with an aim of imparting awareness amomg youth regarding HIV and AIDS,its causes,precautions and regulatory measures.

On the auspicious occassion on 73rd Independence day ,being children of our motherland India we celebrated our independence  with great patriotism.Many events were conducted by NSS IIT Patna in Amhara village to live the day.

Plants are yet another form of life which suffer itself to rejuvenates life in other living creatures.With the responsibility of protecting them as well as other forms a plantation drive was conducted by NSS IIT Patna to plant more and more trees

To make new students aware about NSS, it's Induction program was conducted on  3 August 2019 for BTech batch of 2019. The program aimed at providing information about the various actives undertaken by NSS and it's various cells. It was followed by a QnA session where students showed large participation.

Yoga helps us in developing physical,mental and intellectual personality. it also makes us strong and peaceful so NSS of IIT PATNA organised in Amhara village on the occasion of international yoga day,21 June 2019.

A Graduation Drive was conducted from 8 may 2019 to 10 May 2019 in the campus which aimed to collect some stuff like bedsheets, buckets, books etc from the final year students and to pass it on to the needy . The cooperation and sense of service of the students made the programme a successfull one.
NSS wishes them a great future ahead!

Volunteers of NSS IIT Patna have conducted an awareness drive in nearby area of our Campus to Promote the Participation of Public in General Elections 2019, With Display of Various Poster and by Personal Approach. This Drive aims to strengthen our Democracy and which will directly impact the development of Nation.

There is only one thing in the Universe which a woman still needs to learn and that one thing is that, ‘she has the power to turn the direction of the wind on her own’.                  Focussing on this fact NSS IIT Patna conducted events among women of the village to empower them.

"Prayas" an urge to help, and try till you succeed was the message spread by NSS. It was inaugurated on 27th of January with a basic aim to organise various activities for the children of Amhara High School."

NSS IITP organised a march on the occasion of youth day on 12th Jan 2019 to promote the ideology of precious gem of India Swami Vivekananda.NSS IITP salute the great leader Swami Vivekananda and also to youth power of India.

With an aim to improvise and giving a better life the Rural Development Team of NSS IIT Patna collected clothes that are donated by the Campus Staff and Faculty and Donated it to the Needy People of Nearby Area.

The Chetna Team along with other thousands of organisations across India, took up an initiative to collect funds for the unfortunate and needy people of Kerala. A handsome amount of funds were collected from the Boy's hostel, the Girl's hostel and the Faculty quarter of IIT Patna.
An attitude of service always stands glorified! To implement this Chetna organised a blood donation camp which stood sucessful with collection of 80 units of blood.
The NSS body served a helping hand to those who needs it. Its always good to give from what we have received.
Environment team aim to keep our environment clean and green so that we can be a motivation to others also. There is regular conduction of plantation drives to keep the environment healty.
Adhering to the principle of father Gandhi's idea of Swatcha Bharat has motivated us. Our practices are to promote proper sanitaion and maintain a sense of swatchta throughout the campus.
Plantation drive was conducted inside the campus by NSS team, where many students, faculties, staffs adapted a tree of their own and took the responsibility to look after the trees.

English has become an integral part of our daily life. Focussing on this, the Technical Skill cell conduct regular classes of english for the students of the nearby villages. Weekly tests are conducted to check the proficiency of the students.

Today's world is a Digital World. Life cannot be imagined without the use of mobile & computers. Focussing on this view the Technical Skill cell conducts regular computer training classes in the nearby villages. They teach them all the basic stuffs related to computer along with daily usage facilities available online.

About 4 classes are conducted in a week and subjects are taught to the children of Amhara village in a systematic manner.Subjects covering syllabus under JNVST are taught by the volunteers of Teaching cell. Weekly testa are also conducted to check the performance of the students

Our NSS family headed towards the village to light up hopes among the people of Amhara. The people were briefly introduced about the function of NSS and how it would help them in moving forward towards a bright tomorrow.
